review.title: Very helpful and accomodating staffs.
review.reviewText: Nice and friendly staffs. Even let visitors to stay in lobby longer with free coffee.

review.title: Great staff
review.reviewText: Great stay. Staff amazing. Nice breakfast. Only negative comment is that we were looking forward to a swim but the pool is only 2 meters long... Very different to how it looks in the photo on website

review.title: Expedia vs. Hotel--not on same page
review.reviewText: The hotel itself is fine--close to airport.  Handy for late arrivals.  BUT--you may not have the booking you expected or paid for if you go through Expedia. Not a good experience.

review.title: Sfo
review.reviewText: Ideal for an overnight stay with free transfers to the airport not much in the area though
good location, convenient to go to the airport. Room is clean and staff is nice.

review.title: Airport dump
review.reviewText: Well, at least the hair dryer worked.... nothing else good to say.

review.title: Bathroom and breakfast
review.reviewText: The toilet required 5+ flushes to work. The Shampoo and Conditioner bottles could not be squeezed to use the content.  Looked like they were "refilled" on site and not new containers. The biscuits were soggy on the bottom where they sat in a humid heater.  The English muffin fell apart in my hand when I tried to cut it in half to place in the toaster.
review.negativeRemarks: Everything I mentioned above.
review.locationRemarks: Excellent location for me even though I had to travel to Wallnut Creek and Napa while there.

review.title: Decent place for Super Bowl weekend
review.reviewText: It's a decent hotel, no fancy bells or whistles and no red flags. Clean and comfortable. I appreciate the complimentary shuttle to and from the airport and the small complimentary breakfast(essentials). Made life easy. It took about 25 to 40 mins to get into dowtown San Francisco. Ãœber and Lyft were cool for that. Was about 15 to 20 dollars each way. A little more at night since it was super bowl and people were everywhere.  Overall no Complaints. Tess the front desk lady was also awesome :)

review.title: Better than expected!
review.reviewText:
I was worried when I saw this hotel had 2 1/2 stars. I initially thought I had booked the Holiday Inn Express in Burlingame and that had better reviews. I was pleasantly surprised upon check-in. Our room was very spacious, the bed was comfy and the seating area was great! Each room has a larger than average hotel fridge and a microwave. The room does have blackout shades despite some of the reviews on here. I'm not sure how people missed them! 
Breakfast has many options and it's free! Parking wasn't an issue at all. They do charge $10, but we knew that going in as it is stated on the website. Considering it's near the airport you have to expect this. Larger hotels charge even more to park. The only complaint I had was the air freshener used in the room. It needs to be toned down quite a bit as our clothes even smelled of the scent. I would recommend this HIE to a friend.
Comfortable bed. Clean room. Good breakfast. Airport shuttle was very convenient.
convenient location close to airport, car rental return, places to eat.  Friendly staff.  Good coffee in the morning.
review.negativeRemarks: Air conditioning unit was a little noisy.  Could be updated.

review.title: Nice hotel, friendly staff and convenient locatio.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel with great location for the airport. Staff very friendly and helpful with directions.

review.title: too much for nothing
review.reviewText: in the middle of an industrial airport zone, no value for money

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: Great hotel, great room. We had the executive king room and we enjoyed it. Spacious and clean. Really close to the sfo airport with a free shuttle. We took the Bart to go to downtown.. 30min only. Breakfats is good. A little bit loud at night for the ones doing a late checkin if you have a room on the second floor.

review.title: Airport hotel
review.reviewText: Comfortable and convenient. I particularly apappreciated the breakfast with turkey sausage. Grabbed a banana to eat on my flight .

review.title: Close to SF downtown and airport
review.reviewText: We always stay at any Holiday inn express cuz it's clean and the staff are accomodating.

review.title: Nice Hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: hotel allowed us to check in early, were very courteous, friendly and helpful.  front desk staff Michelle was very nice and cheerful. very clean rooms. breakfast was outstanding. will stay here again.

review.title: Decent Airport Hotel
review.reviewText: It's a great hotel if you want to stay by the airport. The staff was really friendly! We were only there to sleep and then left right away in the morning. I really love Holiday Inn Express, my only problem with this stay was that we didn't have a shower curtain and it seemed like the bathroom didn't have a shower curtain in a while.

review.title: Great value and location next to SFO
review.reviewText:
We've been staying at the HIE for several years now since we discovered how close it is to everything we need in a hotel room when visiting family in the City.  First of all, rather than to stress out my elderly mother who has to deal with water rationing penalties during drought conditions and laundering linen etc., we decided to give her a break several years ago and "just get a room."  At first it was awkward, not staying with family....but honestly, I think everyone is much more relaxed.  We can make it to the car rental center in minutes down the road, get our own breakfast downstairs in the lobby for a quick bite, get on the freeway two blocks away, shop at Costco next door for flowers, gifts, supplies etc. and not pay through the nose for a room in the City where you're most likely going to have your car broken into than here at the HIE.  

The hotel front lobby staff have been here for several years and recognizable by their pleasant, efficient and friendly welcome each and every visit.  When someone enjoys their work, it shows and these ladies are the best!  The rooms are clean, have a little fridge, microwave and coffee pot.  Bathrooms are a bit dated and the toilets need several flushes to down the t.p., but all one needs.  Flatscreen televisions, working heater/ac unit and efficient housekeeping rounds out a pleasant stay.  There's even a McDonald's directly next door if you run into the midnight munchies.
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to SFO and the City.
review.negativeRemarks: Housekeeping works hard and efficiently, but this trip we returned to our room around 2:00 p.m. and sadly the room hadn't been made up.
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to Highway 101, San Bruno for Rolling Pin Donuts and Costco next door.

review.title: Very Nice Location and Accommodations
review.reviewText:
We were in San Francisco for our great-nephew's graduation and had to travel from San Francisco to South San Francisco, and other locations.  This hotel was greatly located, the accommodations were excellent.  The staff was helpful and friendly.  The coffee - VERY good (especially early in the morning) and parking was very convenient.  
I would recommend this hotel to anyone who needed/wanted to stay in or near San Francisco proper, and yet wanted the quiet of a local hotel an not the overwhelming hustle and bustle of a huge hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Larger coffee cups to go to bring to the room.
review.locationRemarks: Although near the airport, there was virtually no noise & it was easy to get to city to explore.

review.title: Close to airport and comfortable
review.reviewText: Beds were very comfortable!! Great location! Bathrooms were a little small

review.title: Great hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: Great hotel, reasonable rates, clean and comfy! The staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I was impressed by the cleanliness of this property. Beds were heavenly!
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing--they are doing a great job!

review.title: Very quiet and comfortable stay
review.reviewText:
I Like staying in the Holiday Express Hotels. The Hotels  are well maintained and a great value and the Staff is always pleasant and courteous. 

I did have a problem with the room when I first arrived the chirping fire detector. Maintenance was dispatched quickly and when it was not an easy fix they switched my room for me.
review.positiveRemarks: The Bed was Awesome!  Drifted right to sleep in it
review.negativeRemarks: It is a budget hotel so any improvement I would suggest would most likely cause the rates to increase. The Bathroom, nice could be nicer with tile
review.locationRemarks: this Hotel is Close the the Airport and San Francisco is a short drive.  As things to do it is more a business travelers location

review.reviewText: Fran was very helpful and gave good references for nearby restaurants.

review.title: Nice hotel near airport
review.reviewText: We were very satisfied with location the hotel as we were taking a morning flight the following day. The early breakfast was very good and complete with many items. The staff was quite helpful and pleasant.  Th rooms were roomy and great for a good night's sleep.  The only concern was that the bright light directly out our window was overwhelming, however, we found the room darkening shades the next morning. The price, with the added taxes, was a little pricy, but not unusual in San Francisco. The confusion with the other Holiday Inn Express was difficult for family coming to visit us at the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: We loved the location and the facility itself.
review.negativeRemarks: The two nearby HI Express need different labelings.
review.locationRemarks: The primary use for the hotel was the location near the airport.

review.title: Business trip worked out well.
review.reviewText:
Close to the airport and walking distance to a few restaurants this was a good location for working in the high-tech area. There is a charge for parking so be mindful of that.

Hotel staff was very nice and helpful. Fitness room is small but good for cardio, no weights. 

Close to SFO but my room was fairly quiet.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to where I needed to be. Also good access to the Bay trail with the entrance about 300 meters away. If you like to run you will like that.
review.negativeRemarks: Better ventilation in the fitness room. No fee parking.
review.locationRemarks: 300 meter to access the Bay Trail so good views and running or walking there.  few minutes walk to a few restaurants.

review.title: Holiday Inn SFO North
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly and courteous. Hotel very clean, close to shopping mall, and of course close to the airport.  Not that far from sight seeing tours in San Fran.
review.negativeRemarks: Can only think of the driveway entry from the road;  very narrow to turn in.

review.reviewText: short stay before flight, one of the better looking holiday inn

review.title: Great value for money
review.reviewText: Having stayed in hundreds of hotels this hotel rates among the best.  The staff were amazing and the room immaculate.  A thoroughly professional outfit.
review.positiveRemarks: Every member of staff was polite and most helpful
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Typical off-airport location, plenty of restaurants.

review.title: Awesome stay
review.reviewText: Usually stay at 4 stars but it was a last minute trip . But was still a 4 star feel . Very good service and the room was a great deal .

review.title: Overnight for trip in SF
review.reviewText: Took over an hour (only 4 people ahead of me) to check in because there was only one person on the desk at 7:30 pm on a Wednesday night.  There was a person that had lost their reservations and was searching for another one at the desk rather than stepping aside and the gal behind the desk let it happen.  She was very nice but did not control the situation.  The room was nice, wireless worked, bathroom clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Better rates, quicker checkin

review.reviewText: This was a very clean place, I will be staying here again on my next trip to SFO

review.title: Great TV channels
review.reviewText: Comfortable room with great TV channels. Convenient for the airport and car rentals.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel. The location is about 25 minutes from downtown San Francisco. The included breakfast is excellent. Large room. Near the airport and car rental car return location. No indoor pool. Just a spa.
review.negativeRemarks: No indoor pool. Just a spa
review.locationRemarks: Shopping center near. McDonald just beside. Not far from downtown.

review.reviewText: Wanted a clean, comfortable room close to SFO.  Got a clean, comfortable room close to SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Location, location, location.  And a decent selection of TV channels to watch.  Nice breakfast, too.
review.negativeRemarks: The towels we had weren't exactly spotless.

review.title: Okay Hotel / Close to Airport
review.reviewText: Check in was supposed to be 2pm. We could not get in our room until 2:40 as housekeeping was behind. When we finally got in our room there was hair clip and juice box on the ground from the last occupants. The staff was nice. Parking and laundry were extra which was frustrating. It would be nice to have this be included to thank people for staying there. Also there was no pool. Hotel was further from city (approx 20min) than I thought it would be. This turned out to be a good thing. We always seemed to be going in the opposite direction of heavy traffic. Overall I would say Hotel was "fine". Not amazing, not terrible. Getting me in my room on time and waving parking fee would have helped my rating.

review.title: San Fran Airport
review.reviewText: The hotel was very nice and brand new, the room was clean and comfy. The staff was friendly and accommodating, and there was even a hot tub! The shuttle was very fast and got us to the airport in 5-10 minutes.

review.title: One night
review.reviewText: We stayed one night at the Holiday Inn Express and although it was expensive it was clean and comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: The food at breakfast could be improved
review.locationRemarks: The location was great as we were flying out the next morning and it was close to the airport and easy to return our rental car.

review.title: pre-trip airport overnight stay
review.reviewText: very convenient to airport, nice spa-pool...we stayed here our last night in town to make the airport trip easier.  The hotel was nice but the staff were great - helping me coordinate the rental car return and with local info on where to eat, etc.
review.locationRemarks: just the airport, really...

review.reviewText: Beds and pillows were amazing. location is perfect right of the freeway.
review.positiveRemarks: Free Breakfast...... And the variety of breakfast available

review.title: Conveniently close to the airport
review.reviewText:
Our room was very clean, the staff was always doing their duties. 
Breakfast was always plentiful, the servers were very prompt and were keeping everything clean around the eating area.
review.positiveRemarks: Conveniently close to the airport and also to the city. It took us only 20 minutes to reach Pier 39.
review.negativeRemarks: Increase the number of parking spots.

review.title: Family weekend getaway
review.reviewText: Overall hotel experience was satisfactory. Need more parking spaces especially for those arriving back to the hotel late evening - had to park next door at an office building and walk next door. Bedding & beds were very comfortable, great variety of breakfast items were available- pancake machine kept breaking down - great invention by the way
review.positiveRemarks: beds & bedding were very comfortable, great variety of breakfast was available
review.negativeRemarks: need more parking spaces available late evening, view of the back of other building, pancake machine was breaking down more often - great invention!!
review.locationRemarks: n/a

review.reviewText: We stayed there the night before our early morning flight from San Francisco Airport. Shuttle to Airport was on time and convenient.
review.locationRemarks: In a high traffic area. Next door to MacDonalds. We managed to cross the busy street to get to IHOP.

review.title: It was a nice hotel and it was close to my meeting
review.reviewText: Enjoyed my stay! It was a nice room and it served it's purpose.
review.negativeRemarks: Price was a bit, too, hight but maybe because it was a last minute booking.
review.locationRemarks: There was a MD next to it, so that was nice/convenient.

review.title: SFO Airport Holiday Express
review.reviewText: Very comfortable room and very clean. Excellent breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Very comfortable room and very clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Replace the standard shower head with a hand held shower head.

review.title: Tops! New rooms, airport shuttle, great breakfast
review.reviewText: Wonderful attentive staff, delicious breakfast, spacious lobby. But most of all very beautifully decorated comfy new rooms, close to SFO airport.
review.positiveRemarks: The double granite sinks, comfy beds, hotel staff.
review.locationRemarks: Close to SFO airport!

review.title: Great hotel only minutes away from S.F.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel close to everything that is San Francisco.
review.negativeRemarks: nothing

review.reviewText: Was nice to be close to the airport and that you had an early shuttle. We needed to be at airport early, our flight leaving at 6am.
review.positiveRemarks: The beds and pillows were very comfortable. The room was attractive.

review.title: Very clean hotel, close to airport.
review.reviewText: We really liked this hotel. It was very clean, the staff was friendly but we were caught off gaurd by the extra $100 they charge for the incidental fee. We booked this hotel through EXPEDIA but the hotel charges the extra fee seperately. As long as the hotels left in good condition, they refund the fee but it could take up to 5 days to get your refund. Other than that, great place to stay.

review.title: Excellent hotel
review.reviewText: This hotel is close to SF airport and car rental. Great breakefast free. But parking you have to pay daily.

review.title: Good hotel for flights out of SFO
review.reviewText:
I had stayed at this hotel before and chose it again because I was satisfied the first time around and because I had another early-morning flight out of SFO.
Hotel is in a convenient location close to the airport and close to the rental car return. This is not a place I would stay for a longer period of time, but it certainly serves its purpose as an airport hotel. I recommend it to others and will stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Hotel is in a convenient location close to the airport. Airport shuttle is a big plus. Rooms are spacious and clean. Wifi works great.
review.negativeRemarks: We had a bit of trouble (long wait) with the shuttle upon arriving at SFO. Staff is average, mainly just do their job.
review.locationRemarks: Good locations for 49ers games (when they played at Candlestick...)

review.title: App Photos and Online Photos not the same.
review.reviewText: One of the reasons we stayed here was the spa tub shown in the bathroom pictures and mentioned in the hotel features. Once we arrived we were told those were only in the suites. And the front desk person had an attitude when I questioned the difference. Her only suggestion was to rebook (with the two nights already paid for) and pay for another two nights in a suite.
review.positiveRemarks: The room was clean and nice but it was NOT what was advertised.
review.negativeRemarks: Change the website to reflect that spa tubs are only in suites.
review.locationRemarks: There is a Gray Line shuttle from the hotel for tours that will take you to downtown SFO to begin Hop-On, Hop-Off tours. This was very helpful.

review.title: Convenient location, Great Staff & Clean rooms
review.reviewText: Had a great experience back in May 2013 and so we decided to stay here again for this trip. The front desk staff is great and the rooms are clean and have the little extras (fridge, safe) that can make a big difference.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient location, Great Staff & Clean rooms
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is very conveniently located - it is a five minute drive from SFO and is practically on Hwy 101.

review.title: Near the airport clean
review.reviewText: Staff is amazing always smiling and there for you! Food is good bedroom washroom is all clean and well prepared

review.title: 49ers trip
review.reviewText: Excellent stay. Everything was as good as I anticipated. Took both my daughters to a NINERS game. Needless to say it was up to there standards. (Lol).

review.title: Nice hotel not too far from the airport.
review.reviewText: This hotel was nice. The room was clean with a great bed. It is pretty close to the airport and lots to eat around. There is a free breakfast that was really neat. The thing is, you have to pay for parking? I have never stayed at a motel where you have to pay to park. Kinda weird to me, but it was a nice place.

managementResponses.response:
Jamie,

Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to the San Francisco Area. I apologize if our breakfast did not meet your expectations. Unfortunately, we are required to offer a brand specific breakfast along with all the other HI Express in the US. I hope that you will be able to give us a second chance when you return to the San Francisco Area.

review.title: Spacious suite but terrible breakfast choice
review.reviewText:
Good, quiet hotel if you just want to crash after a flight but the breakfast is very limited and tasteless.

We booked a suite that was spacious and clean, it's just the food that let's this hotel down.

managementResponses.response:
Mr. Kevin,

Thank you for staying with our hotel during your recent visit to the San Francisco Area. We appreciate the great feedback. Please be sure that you visit our hotel concierge area when you return back to our hotel, we have many lovely restaurants to choose from within a few miles our hotel, if you need help with any recommendations we have quite a few staff favorites as well. We hope to see you soon.

review.title: Good Basic Hotel
review.reviewText: Good average hotel. Breakfast was enjoyable with several items to choose from. Very easy access to SFO Airport & BART travel to downtown. Other than McDonalds next door there is no place to get food for lunch or dinner.

managementResponses.response:
Patricia,

Thank you for staying with the Holiday Inn Express SFO North. We appreciate your business, and hope that you visit us again when you are in the San Francisco area.

review.title: Excellent Stay
review.reviewText: We had a king room with a pull-out couch. The couch wasn't anything to brag about, but for a short hotel stay, I can't complain. There is a McDonalds next door for quick eaters, a gas station a couple blocks away, whirlpool, small workout room, and iHop across the street. This hotel was great, 5.5 miles from Candlestick Stadium and a short shuttle and train ride downtown.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff was very friendly. Having a shuttle to and from the airport (which was very very close) helped tremendously. Free wifi
review.negativeRemarks: More breakfast varieties.
review.locationRemarks: Safe area, but not close to downtown. We took the free shuttle to the airport then hopped on a train from there to Powell Street.

review.title: Holiday Inn Express, SFO Airport
review.reviewText: Stay was very comfortable. Check in and check out was easy. Room service excellent. Located conviniently between SFO downtown and south. Excellent breakfast service. Wifi connectivity in the room and internet available in the lobby. Sufficient parking space. Bad thing if you stay beyond a certain number of days, parking should be free.
review.negativeRemarks: Parking should be free
review.locationRemarks: Located conviniently from downtown SFO and down south. Lot of sightseeing in a driving distance.

review.title: Nice hotel close to SFO
review.reviewText: My family stayed here for six nights and found it to be pleasant and comfortable. They do charge $10 a night for parking. Free hot breakfast is provided. There is a whirlpool and a small fitness room. The hotel is convenient to the airport, Costco (and its gas station), and Route 101. Just a short drive into San Francisco. I would stay here again.
review.negativeRemarks: Provide more fresh fruit or fruit cups for breakfast. Bananas every day gets boring.

review.title: Very convenient to the airport! Friendly staff.
review.reviewText: Met our needs but is difficult to rate coming off of Napa which was over the top experience with tons of extras. Overall this was a good experience and met our needs for having to be near the airport to get out early. Breakfast was ok but not like the rest of San Francisco. Could beef this up a bit.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast

review.title: Holiday Inn Express
review.reviewText:
We enjoyed our stay at the hotel very much. The staff were all very friendly, helpful and courteous. All very personable. Our room was clean and comfortable. The bed was extremely comfortable, like being at home. Although it was only one mile away from the airport and close to highway 101, it was quiet. We did not hear the traffic or planes at all. For those so inclined there is a McDonalds right next door.
The hotel has a shuttle which runs back and forth to the San Fransisco Airport every half hour. It is very convenient for picking up a rental car or taking public transit to get to downtown San Fransisco.
We were very pleased with Expedia and the Holiday Inn Express and we would definitely go there again.

review.title: Short and Sweet Stay
review.reviewText:
We arrived for a late check in but found our room very clean with a modern touch.
Everything we needed was available and got a restful sleep.
No complaints. I would stay there again in the future.
review.positiveRemarks: The complementary breakfast was a nice touch.
review.locationRemarks: Ideal for a quick stay near the airport.

review.title: Very clean. Courteous staff.
review.reviewText: I would definitely stay here again. Good breakfast. Hotel staff was courteous and helpful.

review.title: Birthday Getaway
review.reviewText: Overall, this birthday get away was great. However, I was not completely happy about the parking charge. My daughter came to stay overnight and I did advise the staff that a parking certificate was needed for one day- Saturday . When I checked out Tuesday morning, I was asked for that certification which I did not have because I was not told that it needed to be returned at the end of the reservation and was charged for the entire period. Your front desk staff did not tell me to return the partking certificate upon checking out. Also, I was located on the fourth floor, where is seemed to have families in the rooms, which were very noisy. The Housekeeping Staff was very accommodating and the daily breakfast was very good.
review.negativeRemarks: Fron Desk Staff should communicate better with guests
review.locationRemarks: Take the BART into San Francisco

review.title: Good for airport hotel
review.reviewText: It looks like the hotel was just recently renovated. Seems clean enough, however, hot tub was not hot - warm bath water at best. Decent enough for airport hotel. The shuttle was easy - ran a few minutes late to pick us up, but other than that worked out just fine. Breakfast wasn't open as early as we needed to leave, so that was a disappointment.
review.locationRemarks: Not much around except an IHOP for food. Everything else it seems to need a car.

review.title: on baby watch
review.reviewText: enjoyed my stay,next visit I would like to have a view instead of a brick wall in the back of the hotel! 3-4 floor if possible. the view was not pleasing to the eyes! also the midnight desk person was very snippy with guest...that I did't like.
review.positiveRemarks: housekeeping/the lady that had breakfast in the morning-older lady.she was friendly-nice to my husband and self.we enjoyed her.
review.negativeRemarks: the night manager-we left at 4:00am
review.locationRemarks: beautiful grounds-close to airport

review.title: bad
review.reviewText: the hotel makes me feel so bad at all. And I never go to the hotel again.

review.title: disappointed
review.reviewText: my hotel experience was not good at all. they never told us that the spa was not working,did not see anyone making any effort to fix it.there was always struggle for parkind,yet they wanted to charge us for parking.

review.title: Outstanding!
review.reviewText: Friendly staff and a clean room and keeping services.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast: taste wasn't that great.

review.title: Travelers
review.reviewText: Great hotel and is 1.5 miles from the rental car area of the airport. Room items: bed, desk, bathroom, etc are great!! Breakfast selection pretty good also. Only negative vending machine selection poor. Great place to stay and for sure coming back soon
review.negativeRemarks: Room
review.locationRemarks: Great

review.title: Goods Thnngs to Know
review.reviewText: The desk clerk was poliite and the hotel was clean.

review.title: Excellent Service
review.reviewText: Excellent, friendly service. The room in general has a pleasing layout, very comfortable and clean.
review.locationRemarks: Great location, next to the airport

review.title: Perfect for Flyers
review.reviewText: If you want to be near the airport, this is perfect - less than 5 minutes to rental car return and the team to the terminals. Hotel also offers a free shuttle service that runs at all times. Not close to anything else, so don't stay here if you're touring the Bay Area.
review.negativeRemarks: Not close to anything else.

review.title: Be warned..................
review.reviewText:
Having to pay for parking was a surprise..............
Making the booking through Expedia means that Priority club membership is NOT counted (despite the fact that the rate received was the SAME as if we had just walked in).

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: Thos hotel was a good stay. The maids were friendy.fast was good with a decent variety. The only issue I had was with one of the people at the front desk who gave me misinformation about thd transit system. I would stay here again.
review.locationRemarks: Not too far from downtown San Francisco

review.title: good hotel for the price and location
review.reviewText: Good service, near airport (5 min). Wireless didn't work in our room (3rd floor). We lost 20 min with their support team..the signal was weak..we had to go in the lobby to be connected. Other than that, everything was good. We were at the end of our vacation thus the wireless connection wasn't a big problem for us.

review.title: Super
review.reviewText: Super hotel in good location. Free breakfast, wifi. One minor nit: they charge $9/night for parking.
review.negativeRemarks: None
review.locationRemarks: Near airport

review.title: Cold shower
review.reviewText: My only complaint was that the shower water was cold. The water in the sink was nice and warm, but unfortunately not the shower.

review.title: Comfy room, beware on the shuttle, no wifi
review.reviewText: I chose this hotel since it was close to the airport, had good comments on the airport shuttle, as well as free in-room wifi. Wifi didn't work at all, and when I asked about it, the front desk person said - 'sorry, maybe there's a dead spot'. Well, then - don't advertise free wifi then! We were getting an early flight, so my plan was to check-in, return my car, then get the shuttle back to the hotel. I asked the front desk person a lot of questions about the shuttle, to the point where she was getting impatient - but never did she mention that there are 2 Holiday Inn Express hotels near the airport and not to get on the shuttle that says 'Holiday Inn Express'!!!! Yes, after waiting 20 min at the airport, we got on that shuttle and were taken to the other Holiday Inn Express, 5 miles away. By now it's very late and my choice was to go back to the airport (after many more hotel stops), and wait for the 'right' shuttle, which by now I had no idea what that was. So - after a $20 cab fare, we finally got back to the hotel and a very unapologetic clerk who somehow thought I should know NOT to get on a shuttle that has Holiday Inn Express on it. Between that and the WIFI, I am totally unimpressed and will be writing a letter specifically mentioning this clerk. Breakfast looked ok, not bad for free. Shuttle was right on time in the morning (note - it's WHITE and does not say Holiday Inn Express on it. The other Holiday Inn Express Shuttle is black)
review.negativeRemarks: WIFI didn't work as advertised, front desk staff is terrible, beware of getting on the wrong shuttle to this hotel
review.locationRemarks: very close to the airport, limited dining options nearby

review.title: False Advertising
review.reviewText: The internet advertised that a bar and restaurant was on site. Not true. Smart remark to the alternative. Bus transport to airport not reliable and staff made no alternative plans. (like taxi's) Bus was over 30 minutes late with 12 people waiting. Manager shrugged his shoulders. No, I want be recommending this hotel or any other Holiday Inn Express.
review.negativeRemarks: personel
review.locationRemarks: It was good

review.title: Excellent Breakfast.
review.reviewText: Very convenient to SFO. I'm big on the continental breakfast when traveling because I can eat a good breakfast and otherwise snack the rest of the day. Breakfast buffet was superb. (I'm not sure if the cinamon buns are a staple of this chain, or this hotel, but they ranked up there with Cin-a-bon). Clerk was super friendly and helpful. Not overly crowded, clean, nice hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Breakfast, convenience to travel, not overly crowded.
review.negativeRemarks: N/A.
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to SFO

review.title: Californa
review.reviewText:
Too far from the city.
Shuttle service was nice but only runs to airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Too far from city.
review.locationRemarks: Airport

review.title: SMOKE DETECTORS NEEDED
review.reviewText: I was very pleasesd to see what a clean and modern hotel this is. Very up to date. The only negative was when I opened the door to my room I could immediately smell the cigarette smoke left by some prior occupant. I don't know how to get rid of that smell but it hit me everytime I entered the room. The hotel industry needs to solve this problem!

review.title: Adequate hotel facility.
review.reviewText: You pay for what you get. The Breakfast menu was nothing to rave about - especially the plastic paper plates, bowls and cutlery. There was no restaurant facilities within the hotel, so guests had to forage on their own. This was adequate for staying a short trip if you didn't intend to stay in the hotel all day.
review.positiveRemarks: Conveniently close to the airport, with complimentary airport shuttle.
review.negativeRemarks: No food facilities, would have at least expected non-plastic cutlery to use.
review.locationRemarks: Very close to the airport.

review.title: Stay close to San Francisco airport
review.reviewText: This place is great when you are flying out of SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Parking is well lit, and the room is clean and comfortable every stay.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, with food options nearby.

review.title: Lock your door if you can
review.reviewText:
The door lock to our room did not work. We requested another room but they said this happen often and they need to send a " handy man" to try to fix it. Once he came he went through a lot of changes to say it was fixed but finally admitted the door was not fixed and would not lock. We again asked to move room so they finally switched us rooms.

Also the wireless Internet is extremely slow. The signal and service was to weak to work with my ipad.

Overall the room was decent and the bed was very comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast too incomplete to really ofer to customers. It's a let down

review.title: Clean and comfortable
review.reviewText:
We needed a hotel close to the airport because we had a very late arriving flight. It was close by and check in was easy. I was worried about noise from the airport but it was very quiet.

Free breakfast was very good. Staff at breakfast was super friendly.

review.title: Comfortable Room but.....
review.reviewText: Returned from Europe late at night and wanted to stay near airport before traveling home. Pleasant surprise, good amenities, large comfortable room, good lighting, etc. But had to pay $9 for parking but the lot was full so was told to park at the Best Western across the street and had to navigate with luggage across busy four lane street with no cross walk. Not good.
review.negativeRemarks: parking

review.title: Simple, comfort and close to airport
review.reviewText:
It is close to airport, clean, with 30mins scheduled shuttle service between airport and hotel. But the shuttle take care two other hotels which can be quite crowded.

No kettle in room, no hot drink inside except coffee.

review.title: Curtains did not darken the room
review.reviewText: The rooms do not have full drapes and for one entire side of the hotel, there is a bright light shining in the windows. We had to ask twice to get a room where it would be reasonably dark enough to sleep. The staff person didn't get it.

review.title: Good Hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: The room was very nicely furnished, nice bedding and clean. Close to the airport, but not close to a variety of restaurants, McDonald's is next door. Good shuttle service to airport and nice breakfast variety that is included.

review.title: Clean but inflexible.
review.reviewText: The continental breakfast did not start until 6am. This may not be condusive to business travel. Also, there were no room darkening shades. I had a street lamp lighting my room up every night.

review.title: Handy Hotel
review.reviewText: Hotel was close to the airport, easy to return rental car before flight. Room was clean, big tv, and adequate breakfast. Close to the mall.
review.locationRemarks: We were very close to the airport, easy to return rental car before our flight. Room was clean, big tv, and breakfast adequate. Close to a mall.

review.title: Just what we needed
review.reviewText: Our overall experience was good. We had the free breakfast, which was good. Our hotel room was clean and we didn't have any complaints, except that the price is a bit high.

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: Good area, no much noise even being so close to airport.

review.title: EOL is not coming back to HIE
review.reviewText: I will not come back to this HIE hotel in San Francisco North airport. Far from downtown SF I was forced to stay 1 more day because I did a mistake when I booked the hotel and there was no other option, the attendance person was really aggressive when I was there on my first night

review.title: Close to SFO but that's about it. If you go a mile north, hotels do not charge $7 parking fee.
review.reviewText: I had a joy of staying at a three different hotels near SFO. Hilton was best, this was second best and the Radisson was just okay.

review.title: Clean, convenient hotel with a decent price.
review.reviewText: I have always been enjoying staying at Holiday Inn Express. This was no exception - clean, quiet, and convenient. Free breakfast was a great bonus.

review.title: close to airport
review.reviewText: If you're looking for a Hotel close to the airport for one night, the room was clean and comfortable and included a free buffet breakfast.

review.title: Good Option
review.reviewText: Good alternatively when touring both the City of San Francisco and the zones further South. Easily accessible, quiet, clean - includes breakfast. Good value for the money.

review.title: good value
review.reviewText: hotel was nice short distance from downtown if you have a rental car if not need to take the shuttel to the airport and the the train to dwn town cvic center cost $ 8.10 each way hotel staff were very freindly and helpful and made you feel welcome We would stay here agian

review.title: Just one thing.....
review.reviewText: Would have been a perfect stay except for ONE thing my perfume went missing from my room figured i never packed it when i returned home it was not home so i was correct it was taken from my room...

review.title: Perfect location; Great shuttle service to/from airport.
review.reviewText: Great location, Extremely close to airport and provides excellent shuttle service to/from airport. Good restaurants close, and usual Holiday Inn Express breakfast available......even before early shuttle to airport. Room was great; clean and comfortable.

review.title: Express for Less by SF
review.reviewText: Updated and modern decor with comfortable linens, beds and pillows made for a great stay. Delicious and varied breakfast with many healthy choices for food. Parking is too small and tight. When we made the reservation we were told free parking but now the hotel wants to charge $7.95 for parking. The fee was waived because there were no spots left and we had to park across the street at the Best Western. Great, close location to SF and saved lots of money with only a 5 minute drive into the city.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, don't expect a good breakfast!

review.title: HOTEL IS DEFINITELY DO-ABLE!
review.reviewText: Nice hotel with very clean and friendly staff. Room was clean and had appropriate amenities. Only negative I found was charging for parking when there was no need to do so.

review.title: Not bad, but not great
review.reviewText: The hotel is not in the best location, but it's conveniently close to the airport. Breakfast was so-so, but it's nice that there is something hot in the morning. There is a McDonald's right next door which is great. Hotel, as is with all Holiday Inn Express we've stayed at, was clean, and the beds are comfortable. The only complaint is we checked in as 4 people, and we kept getting 3 sets of towels. The first time we asked for another set, we were questioned about why we needed another set of towels. We asked the front desk to make a note that we have 4 people and need 4 towels, but it was never done. Also, parking is an additional charge. It's not expensive, but beware.

review.title: great resting spot
review.reviewText: needed a place to stay overnight near the airport..so much to choose from. the 'express' is much much better than other hotels in same price point.rooms very clean and comfortable. parking a pain they charge $6.00 but room was cheap. right next door to 24hr mcdonalds for late night snakc close to restaurants. for sure would stay here again and i am a fussy guest..always wanting 4+ star for price of 3.

review.title: Comfortable stay, close to the city
review.reviewText: We really enjoyed our staying in this hotel. It met all our needs: Clean room, comfortable king size bed, free parking and breakfast in the morning. Despite the fact that you almost can see the airport from your window, you won't be able to hear the noise from the airplanes. It's a very quite and peaceful hotel. If you have a car, the city is a 10 minute drive away. The freeway entrance is a few blocks from the hotel. The breakfast was nice and had a good variety within the hotel standard, don't expect the gourmet food so. Hotel has a fitness room and jacuzzi but we didn't use them due to our really limited time of staying.

review.title: quality airport hotel in SF
review.reviewText: The hotel is very close to airport with free car parking. It was a comfortable and clean hotel. The breakfast was satisfactory. We stayed four nights and we did not encounter any problem.

review.title: impressed and nice.
review.reviewText: i want to sleep this hotel again.

review.title: Really comfortable beds :)
review.reviewText: The hotel staff was very friendly and the check-in was pretty fast. Our room was clean, bigger that we expected and the beds are really, really comfortable. The breakfast is ok, don't expect too much :)

review.title: Rich
review.reviewText: Front desk was very nice.

review.title: Excellent!
review.reviewText: The rooms were clean and comfortable. Plenty of room for all of our family and belongings as well as plenty of towels and soap! Most importantly the hotel staff was very kind and courteous when we had a very early flight with very young children and were still able to get complimentary cereal and milk for them well before breakfast hours!

review.title: Better than the Westin on Market Street
review.reviewText: We were very please and surprised by this hotel, it was excellent for the price and better than our stay at the Westin on Market street.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText: Central location to different cities in the region

review.title: Very convenient to the airport with good shuttle service. Very nice and clean hotel.
review.reviewText: Very convenient to the airport with good shuttle service. Very nice and clean hotel.

review.title: Would stay there again, very convenient to San Fran Airport
review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable rooms, good breakfast.

review.title: Dont stay here!
review.reviewText: Beds were extremely uncomfortable and there was no hot water. Manager was not helpful with problems or changes to the reservation.

review.title: I'd go back!
review.reviewText: The front desk staff was fantastic! They were extrememly helpful and always willing to answer our questions. The hotel was clean and comfortable. A little farther from downtown San Francisco than we would have preferred, but the hotel even provided a free shuttle to the public transportation (BART)

review.title: AWESOME!
review.reviewText: Definitely value for money

review.title: Muir Woods Trip
review.reviewText: Go see the Redwoods!!!

review.title: Great hotel and value
review.reviewText: Check in was quick and easy! The hotel room was very nice and well kept. Its very close to the airport but we were never bothered by the sound of airplanes or other noises while we slept. I have already booked this hotel for my next trip!

review.title: Nice, Convenient and well maintained
review.reviewText: We stayed here for 2 nights before we drove out to Yosmeite. The hotel was conveniently located, and was clean. For the price, it was a good deal.

review.title: I am glad I picked it
review.reviewText: Comfortable and clean, good for any family - with kids or elderly. No outside noise. Easy comute to San Francisco - city, bay area, anywhere.

review.title: Quality service and cleanliness
review.reviewText: I wonderful stay....very clean, friendly, efficient service and a wonderful meal with excellent waitstaff in the restaurant !

review.title: Hotel review
review.reviewText: Rooms were nice service was terrible and the breakfest was a joke!

review.title: Typical Holiday Inn
review.reviewText: We asked for a nonsmoking room and were told that they would see what they could do. We had to stay in a smoking room our entire stay. Good thing we spent very little time in the room. The hallway on the floor of our room reeked of smoke. YUK!!!!! It was nice to have a breakfast bar since there was no resturant. We would stay again but insist on a nonsmoking room or ask for a refund and stay on a smoke free property.

review.title: Great hotel for a great price
review.reviewText: I stayed here over the weekend and found it to be one of the better hotels I've stayed at in the SFO area. The hotel itself is very clean, the staff very friendly, and the room very comfortable. My only complaint is the parking which was crowded that weekend. Breakfast is included with your stay and I must say it exceeded my expectations. It wasn't just cereal, rolls, and coffee. There were some hot foods (sausage, eggs, biscuts, gravy) as well as other choices including hard boiled eggs, yogurt, and oatmeal. They also have a nice business center which you can use for internet access and even printing. I would stay here again for sure.

review.title: Very friendly and helpful front desk.
review.reviewText: Very clean. Morning breakfast was fresh and alot to pick from. Health choice and sweet ones too

review.title: Would stay again
review.reviewText: The Holiday Inn Express was very clean and the breakfest was very nice. It was within walking distance of the South Airport Convention Center.

review.title: comfortable
review.reviewText: We arrived before 1 p.m. (checkin time is 2 p.m.) but they did not tell us to wait etc. The room is clean and spacious. Wireless internet was a little troublesome at first. Had to call Helpdesk 3 times to log on, no problem afterwards. Room was cleaned late in the afternoon. It was ok for most days when we were out. But did not get cleaned on our last day because we got back early in the afternoon when the maid came to clean. We just rather stay in then have it cleaned. Breakfast was good except it was the same thing for the 4 days we were there. The cinnamon rolls that were advertised so strongly were only available once and was really not that good.

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: Very good hotel we only stayed there for one night on a stop over, got in late and left early, good breakfast. Only complaint was the wait for thye shuttle, half a hour at the airport, where other buses came by three to four times before theres came by once. the next morning was great though

review.title: Very good location close to the airport
review.reviewText: Big, clean, comfortable room. Shower and bathroom are very good. Breakfast is excellent. Lobby is not appealing and the carpets in the corridors are dirty. Hospitality and the front desk services are good and the employees are very friendly. Free shuttle service is very handy.

review.title: awesome
review.reviewText: awesome hotel. clean room, friendly staff, great breakfast. would def go back

review.title: Very convenient
review.reviewText: Great for attending the Conference Center right next door. Good breakfast, saves a few bucks. Unfortunately I had to sepnd my first night in a smoking room due to a mix up. Moved the next day and the staff was very helpful.

review.title: Very Nice Experience
review.reviewText: After spending an entire weekend in the hotel, I will say that the accommodations were unexpectidly nice. The staff was very friendly, helpful, and attentive. The continental Breakfast that they serve was better than expected.
